channel.title: Hey how do i spawn onsters to kill in my own ip address?
channel.description: How do i spawn monsters in my own server and is there certain places i have to do it?

item.title: Hey how do i spawn onsters to kill in my own ip address?
item.dc:creator: @l_Whitney_l l Whitney l
item.description:
@l_Whitney_l wrote:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 494 3256 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 3253 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Male Banker spawn = 495 3252 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Female Banker spawn = 495 3254 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Female Banker spawn = 494 3187 3436 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Male Banker spawn = 495 3187 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Female Banker spawn = 494 3187 3440 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 3187 3442 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 3187 3444 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Male Banker spawn = 495 3187 3446 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Female Banker spawn = 494 2945 3366 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador West Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 2946 3366 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador West Bank Male Banker spawn = 495 2947 3366 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador West Bank Female Banker spawn = 494 2948 3366 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador West Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 2949 3366 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador West Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 3011 3353 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador East Bank Male Banker
NPC / Monster Format.

Yes i used this on the other topic so what! :-p

item.title: Hey how do i spawn onsters to kill in my own ip address?
item.dc:creator: @xunb3atabl3x xunb3atabl3x
item.description:
@xunb3atabl3x wrote:

you have to open up autospwan in your source folder go to the bottom and add them in, up top it will tell you what go’s in what row. thats just how to spawn it tho… you have to open npc handler too put the other information in (like there hp and w/e)
